info.name: DEPRECATED - Userstyles - Comment Number/Permalink
info.description: ▶ New : Work Too with Greasy Forum - Add Numbers to Comments in GreasyFork and UserStyles forum - Reveal the Comment's Permalink in Forum's discussion with a ToolTip (on hover). - Reveal the comment Number of each discussion. ▶ Work great with my Userstyles: Userstyles / Greasy Fork Enhancer Dark-Grey Userstyles - Large Edit On Focus ▶ Support for GM: GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - for TS Citrus Gfork GreasyFork Bullshit Filter ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: Change : ▶ Support for GM: GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - for TS Citrus Gfork GreasyFork Bullshit Filter - Correction for Domains - Correction for USERSTYLES REVIEW: https://forum.userstyles.org/categories/style-reviews - Correction for Greasy Fork - Counter for Discussion Lists - Script Name on line line and Add Icon Script before in Scripts Discussion List in Greasy Fork. - Fix Rating Icon This Userstyles Use CLIP CSS : - rect(v1, v2, v3, v4) : v1 début de la zone visible verticale, v2 fin de la zone visible horizontale, v3 fin de la zone visible verticale, v4 début de la zone visible horizontale. L'unité "%" ne semble pas être acceptée. For the tooltip , the original idea came from: Use Cases for Multiple Pseudo Elements
